message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I think it would be a valuable addition to your inventory and am confident you'll be pleased with the purchase.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a price closer to $13,750.  This product offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll see a return on that investment.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I'd like to propose a price of $13,500. I hope this aligns better with our respective positions.
